website_summaries.verdict: One of the least-expensive bingo sets you'll find that includes a spinning cage with numbered balls.
pros: You'll be able to begin playing immediately with this bingo kit
Contains a spinning cage with bingo balls, calling board, 50 cards, and chips
There is enough for between 12 and 15 players
cons: To make use of all 50 cards at once, you'd need more chips

customer_reviews.title: An Oldie But Goodie
customer_reviews.text: I bought this game for our recent family Thanksgiving get together. We always play games and it has become a struggle to find something that all ages can play. Then I thought about Bingo and it was perfect! My 92 Year old grandma played and so did my three-year-old granddaughter. I'm not knocking technology but it was good to play something tactile that we remember while introducing it to the youngsters. We had plenty of game cards with bold letters and numbers we could decipher easily. The markers were a breeze to distribute and the basket worked properly. Perfect game for a perfect event at a perfect price. I'm so glad I purchased it.
customer_reviews.author: Thickathanabible

customer_reviews.title: Can I get a number?
customer_reviews.text: The reviews were good, compared to others for this price. So I decided on this product. The plastic material used to make the balls feels weird, but the rest of the set is ok. I hate the hassle of shipping everything back. Can I just get a new number 29?!
customer_reviews.author: Rasy

customer_reviews.title: Great fun.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to teach grandson Bingo. It's not all that sturdy, but sturdy enough for a kindergarten kid. We all played. It helped his math and organizational skills ( he insisted on managing the calling board) and we all laughed along the way.
customer_reviews.author: OldDancer

customer_reviews.title: Good Product, Duplicate Numbers
customer_reviews.text: Overall great product, would buy again. Only complaint is card with duplicate numbers, N34. There may be more, but this is the only one I have come across so far.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Fun During Covid Mess
customer_reviews.text: We use this Bingo to play virtual bingo. Everyone logs onto Google Duo and we play bingo on Friday and Saturday nights. Everyone just lives about 7 miles apart but my husband has heart failure so we don't congregate like we use to. It's fun and everyone looks forward to it. I purchased fast food gift cards ahead of time and that's the prize. Kids and adults look forward to winning.
customer_reviews.author: Tawnya Hill

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: My family loved this bingo set, it's great quality. The only reason I didnt give it a 5 star is because there is no way to lock the ball dispenser for a thorough mixing, so you can't give it several turns because the ball gets dispensed in the first turn. But overall it's a great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Basabe

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: The game is great, the amount of cards you get are great. I only wish there were no yellow cards it can be hard to read the numbers. I also wish the number on the darker colored balls could be white instead of black because they can sometimes be hard to read. Other than that we have so much fun playing.
customer_reviews.author: Prettygyrl

customer_reviews.title: The ball cage is a dud
customer_reviews.text: When you turn the handle the ball doesn't always drop in the holder. When it did drop the ball kept falling out and ended up on the floor. I ended up putting all the balls in a bowl and picking them from there. Big disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: bay area shopper

customer_reviews.title: Great set for elderly bingo lovers
customer_reviews.text: My family just loves this my grandma being of old age and poor health can’t attend bingo and during covid no one could so as a family we get together ever other weekend and play bingo now everyone from the kids to the adults love it
customer_reviews.author: Anthony scott

customer_reviews.title: It's Bingo Time
customer_reviews.text: With COVID going out these days with the kids is difficult. So we have BINGO NIGHT at Nana's house. The boys just love play and it occupies time in the evening. I purchased small toys and put them in a box as prizes for winning. You get plenty of cards and chips but the more people that play you will need more chips. Over all this is very sturdy set. Glad we got it!
customer_reviews.author: Scott Rissman

customer_reviews.title: Pretty great
customer_reviews.text: Bought for a family reunion and it was perfect. Everything is small which made it nice to transport. Could use more tokens, we didn’t have enough so had to get creative.
customer_reviews.author: Brhyde

customer_reviews.title: Everything you need to play a casual round of bingo!
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality bingo cards, balls, cage, and holder. Bingo balls need to be separated before use. They are rather small and took a second to read but worked fine. Great price point for a set you might only pull out for a few gatherings or playing with your friends online.
customer_reviews.author: msh0429

customer_reviews.title: Very poor quality.
customer_reviews.text: The metal cage arrived so bent that the balls were impossible to get out once they were placed in...which was no easy task as that hinge was also bent. The balls themselves were not vibrant colors but wishy-washy pastels and very light in weight. I returned this and will not order another one.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Fun game
customer_reviews.text: Great bingo game for our family to play! Good price, fun game
customer_reviews.author: Teresa

customer_reviews.title: Bingo Game
customer_reviews.text: For family use especially during this pandemic times, we can play at home for fun.
customer_reviews.author: momma

customer_reviews.title: Good Bingo set for the price
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this set during quarantine to play virtually with family and friends. The I balls are very difficult to view over webcam so I invested in a new set. For those families playing together it is a great and complete set. Has many cards and markers and fun colored balls.
customer_reviews.author: Tahiri Perez

customer_reviews.title: Just as described & super fun
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this for family quarantine game night to include my grandma it was a hit & we had so much fun!
customer_reviews.author: Maggie

customer_reviews.title: Missing balls had to return
customer_reviews.text: Loved the look and quality of everything, but had to return it because the balls were missing 🤦🏾‍♀️
customer_reviews.author: NatividadK

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: Great for family game night. Helps my daughter learn numbers as well.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany G.

customer_reviews.title: Enjoying our new bingo game.
customer_reviews.text: Enjoyed the bingo game. Very good quality product. The only thing I would change are the colors on the bingo balls. Brighter colors would make it easier to read the numbers. At least we can entertain ourselves with bingo at home due to the Corona Virus constraints.
customer_reviews.author: Evie

customer_reviews.title: Good but needs work
customer_reviews.text: Everything is good except the cage the balls go in when you spin it they will fall to the floor not in the holder where they are supposed to
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Missing Pieces
customer_reviews.text: Our Bingo game came missing some of the "G" letter balls and we didn't know until we were mid way through our office bingo game which was quite inconvenient. Also every time we turned the wheel the balls would fly out and not roll down to where they were supposed to.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Anne Harris

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for family game night!
customer_reviews.text: This product is excellent. It came in a great box that you can store for future use. The cards, the ball wheel, and game board were all sturdy. I looked all over for a forever BINGO game for my family and I found it. My family and I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Candy

customer_reviews.title: Fun for all!
customer_reviews.text: As described and very affordable. It was a great addition to family night! Fun and interactive.
customer_reviews.author: Honey King

customer_reviews.title: Needs chips
customer_reviews.text: Missing the Bingo Chips...but I bought extra chips and cards for an event party, so thankfully was ok. I love the sturdiness of the cards. The numbers are big and easy to read also.
customer_reviews.author: Madexx

customer_reviews.title: One of my favorite family game
customer_reviews.text: My family and I had a blast playing this especially during this hard time. Great game
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Numbers erased after multiple used...
customer_reviews.text: The numbers is fading after playing maybe 6x. Most of the bumbers completely erased. Would be better if engrave. Balls falling in the side of the metal way. Now i need to buy balls to replace them
customer_reviews.author: juna

customer_reviews.title: The order was incomplete and product was poor quality
customer_reviews.text: The 50 5 color bingo cards were missing. The cage is hard to open and the numbers have started to rub off of the balls after just one use. Would not buy again or recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: P Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Works great and the board to hold the called off bingo balls is much better than the standard flat cardboard one that they just roll off of
customer_reviews.author: Grinchmike

customer_reviews.text: I got this for my family and I and we definitely enjoy it.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: It was perfect! We had hours Of fun playing bingo! Very easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Maria B.

customer_reviews.title: Missing all B balls!
customer_reviews.text: Product came with no B’s at all. And it came with an extra G set.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander Large

customer_reviews.title: incomplete
customer_reviews.text: not sturdy and did not come with the chips even though it says included
customer_reviews.author: LIZ

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the value
customer_reviews.text: Very small set could barely read the numbers off the balls.!
customer_reviews.author: Johnnita Smith

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: I very much like the game. It's a sturdy game.
customer_reviews.author: Ckozy

customer_reviews.title: Great value. Wish Numbers were etched and not stamped for quality reasons.
customer_reviews.text: My wife loved this a little too much... ever since purchasing her this game she has not stopped asking to play. With so many cards included you can have a lot of people playing as once. Decent quality parts however I do wish the numbers were etched in and not stamped and some of them showed up faded.
customer_reviews.author: Brian V.

customer_reviews.title: Happy
customer_reviews.text: Worth every penny! I wish it had at least 100 cards
customer_reviews.author: LADYSIXTWO

customer_reviews.title: Very poor quality product
customer_reviews.text: In less than a month the numbers on the bingo balls faded; some completely making them useless. This was a gift and so, it was embarrassing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Yuanhe Complete Bingo Game Set-6 Inch Metal Cage with Calling Board, 75 Colored Balls, 300 Colorful Bingo Chips,50 5 Color Mix Bingo Cards for Large Group Games
product_meta.description:
This deluxe bingo cage set for adults and childeren includes a top quality metal bingo cage, a solid constructed hard plastic bingo master board, 50 colorful bingo cards,75 colorful plastic balls,300 bingo chips and instructions.
Metal bingo cage is black coated for extra durability. It measures 8"*8"*8"(20cm*20cm*20cm), overall size.
The Bingo board is made from two sturdy plastic pieces that hook together at the top and bottom. Each board measures 13.38"(34cm) long and 5.9"(15cm) wide.The boards hold a combined total of 75pcs balls.
The Bingo cards are made from heavy cardboard, measuring 4.72"(12cm) x 5.12"(13cm), making them highly durable and easy to read. You can use and reuse the cards after each game.
Bingo balls are 15mm diameter numbered 1-75(White-B-1-15,Red-I-16-30,Yellow-N-31-45,Blue-G-46-60,Green-O-61-75).
Bingo chips are made from high quality plastic, durable,reusable and transparent.They are large bingo chips in 19mm diameter.
Color box package makes a great gift idea for you and yours.Great bingo game fun for the entire family and friends!Commonly used at home parties for entertainment. Not intended for gambling purposes. Unsuitable for children under age three as there are small parts.
feature_bullets: Enjoy the classic game of Bingo, a complete set with instructions packed into one color box. Everything you need to start playing right out of the box!
Each set comes with a 6 inch metal cage, a calling board,50 colorful bingo cards,75 colorful plastic balls,300 bingo chips and instructions
This deluxe bingo game set is simple to use. Just give it a spin and watch as the balls roll down the metal slot for number callouts.
Enough for 12-15 players to play. Great for parties, barbeques or family game nights.
Color box package, it also makes a great gift idea for you and yours

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
